articles.author: Nehal Chaliawala and Ketan Thakkar
articles.title: Mercedes-Benz to assemble EVs in India starting this year - Economic Times
articles.description: The Stuttgart-based company will start making its top-of-the-line EQS electric limousine in India starting this year. Having entered Indias EV market in October 2020, the local unit of the company quickly sold its allocated units over the last 15 months.

articles.title: India retail inflation rises to 5.59% in December, hits 5-month high - Economic Times
articles.description: India's benchmark inflation rate, measured by the Consumer Price Index (CPI) firmed up to 5.59% year-on-year in December 2021, data released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation on Monday showed.

articles.title: Oil at USD 84 again: Petrol, diesel price on hold for 68th day in a row - Economic Times
articles.description: On November 4, 2021, excise duty on diesel was cut by Rs 10 a litre and that on petrol by Rs 5 per litre, resulting in an equivalent reduction in retail pump rates.
